sentences.english: The heart of that ex-convict was full of virginity .

黑話，便是語言中的苦役犯。

sentences.english: The area was settled in 1824 as a penal colony. Population, 734,750.
sentences.chinese: 1824年開始此地區作爲苦役犯的殖民地而居住。
